text: wal-mutalaqatu yatarabbasna bi-anfusihinna thalathata quruin wala yahillu lahunna an yaktum'na ma khalaqa l-lahu fi arhamihinna in kunna yu'minna bil-lahi wal-yawmi l-akhiri wabuʿulatuhunna ahaqqu biraddihinna fi dhalika in aradu is'lahan walahunna mith'lu alladhi ʿalayhinna bil-maʿrufi walilrrijali ʿalayhinna darajatun wal-lahu ʿazizun hakimun
